name: Plop Saga
description: Plop Saga is a indie Pixel art game with beautiful music. In this game, you guide Plop to run and jump to finish the journey with courage and strength.

name: Once Again
description: “Once Again” is an interactive story game about a boy who spends his summers wandering between past and present. After meeting her, summer will never be the same again.

name: Garlant: My Story
description: I am an adventurer who just graduated from college. In pursuit of the challenge, I came to the distant border of the Kingdom: the town of Garlant in the Doly region. I will write a new chapter in my life here. It will be a wonderful adventure story.

name: The Merchant's Guide to the Kingdom
description: You are an NPC and shopkeeper in an MMORPG world. Trade, craft and manage a guild to acquire the most powerful gear and face dangerous dungeons, world bosses, rare spawns and up to 40-man raids while following the campaign to aid in the protection of the ancient and powerful Elemental Stones.

name: Capytales: A Folk Adventure
description: Accompany Capytu on her journey against the hideous Dry Body. Challenge powerful members of Brazilian Folklore to protect mother nature using the power of Capybara spirits, solving puzzles and platform challenges. And catch all the collectibles hidden along the way.

name: Call Hating
description: Master outdated technology and navigate the phone tree from hell to get your internet back on. At all costs.

name: Terminus Historia
description: Dark fairy tale / multi-scenario system / fantastic all pixel art! In the boundary called the "Terminus" between human's world and the devil's world,A spectacular war between humans and demons will unfold.

name: The Clown's Forest
description: You play as Michael, a 17-Year-old College Student, who had gone camping with his friends over the weekend, although, unfortunately for them, it turned from a peaceful getaway to a fight for survival.

name: Judgeball: Lethal Arena
description: 3 vs 3 Dark and violent TPS Sport game with ultra-intense and brutal gameplay in a hostile Cyberpunk arena. Co-op, teamplay and champion customization are crucial in order to optimize your strategy and crush the opposition.

name: Celeritas
description: Celeritas is a fast paced runner shooter and platformer, made for speedrunners.

name: Trachi: Autonomy - InvAsion
description: An isometric kinetic novel. The death of AUTONOMY. And a precursor to something new.

name: Brain Exam with Benefits 2
description: Brain Exam with Benefits 2 is a lighthearted Match 3 game with Mei, a sexy brain examiner as your guide. You'll get to see her in a variety of sexy outfits! Impress her with your smartness to charm her into submission, or fail pathetically.

name: Woodlock Manor
description: Woodlock Manor is a grid-based puzzle game where you must dodge and outsmart various traps to uncover the secrets hidden in the depths below.

name: The Cecil: The Journey Begins
description: “Cecil” is a survival horror-based game about the mysteries of the famous Cecil hotel, but with a twist. Explore the hotel and find out about the mysteries and untold stories that lie within the halls of horror.

name: Chonky: From Breakfast to Domination
description: Cute characters, cuddly enemies and an all together chonky world. Fight your way through adorable monsters, collect all kinds of loot and find new spells to help you on your journey. Face the dangers alone or with a companion that can assist you as an even cuter baby Chonky.

name: Egglien
description: A retro space themed action shooter where your bullets send you flying through the air!

name: Right and Down
description: A deep roguelike and card game that is played using only two buttons: Right and Down! Choose your hero and explore randomly generated card dungeons, gather powerful artifacts to get new abilities, and fight against mighty enemies! Will you make it to level 100?

name: The Patient: After Hours
description: You are a night worker who has to clean up after a long day of trading at the local mall. But as the night quickly progresses you start to realize that something isn't quite right.

name: Tracery of Fate VR
description: Tracery of Fate VR is a dark fantasy cooperative/solo VR game in magic post-apocalyptic world.

name: Mello Haunted House
description: Mello Haunted House is a 2D Survival horror game based on the story of an old haunted house located in Indiana which is said to be haunted by an angry old man's spirit.

name: Craggenrock
description: Craggenrock is a crafting shop management game taking place on a remote island after a great disaster. You play as Arlo, a young crafter seeking a name of his own replacing his former crafting master in the mining town of Pareho.

name: I Was Wrong
description: A gorgeous short exploration game, focused in tell the story of brilliant man, who ended up trapped inside his own mind. He needs to escape from his mind, but the only way is follow a strange female voice while he tries to remember important things by reading messages in old monitors.

name: Deep Alchemy Dungeon
description: D.A.D. is a dungeon crawling game were alchemy skills play crucial role. Young witch ominous plans were destroyed when she was put in a jail. But she founds ancient laboratory full of secrets and new shining perspectives behind the broken wall.

name: Crossedland
description: If you've always loved building villages, farming, and taking care of villagers but wished there was more action and exploration, Crossedland is the home for you!

name: Jettatura
description: Jettatura is a challenging first-person dungeon-crawler (DRPG) with round-based combat. Form a band of up to six mercenaries to scout the subterrene world to reclaim a stolen ancient artifact from the surreptitious death-cult that pilfered it!

name: Energy Collector
description: An idler about collecting energy. Automate the the collection process, manage your resources by transferring them between fields and buy awesome upgrades. For what? To get more energy!

name: College Bound: Episode 4
description: Fasten your seatbelts and check if you are alone in the room because FOZ presents you with a brand new part of College Bound - Episode 4 is out now! The fourth part of the engaging adult game has way more content, images, sex scenes (now with sounds), and animations than ever before!

name: Desstroke
description: Desstroke - is a masterpiece of game industry, цруку you can damage everything you see, and have fun. You can blow everything up, or even jump from the balcony, that's on you. Oh, and SOON you will play with your buddies in a battle royale with cars, many guns and unforgettable community.

name: Age of Barbarians Chronicles
description: Chronicles is a crude and violent action RPG game in pure Sword & Sorcery style. Get ready to live the heroic and bloody adventures of barbarians, amazons, and sorcerers against the insane and omnipotent Sorcerer Gods, absolute masters of the prehistoric world of Atlan.

name: Artifacts of Eyru
description: Artifacts of Eyru is a rogue-lite first person shooter with RPG elements. Play as 4 classes as you delve into the dungeons of Eyru, claim powerful artifacts, and unravel the mysteries of the planet.

name: Honey Toast
description: Honey Toast is a cute action platformer about a toast trying to find his toaster. Show your platforming skills with unique movement mechanics and defeat the enemies along the way.

name: Minigunner
description: Fight to survive in this intense twin-stick shooter! Collect sentries, items, and drones as you unleash mayhem to defend a mining outpost from waves of goopy monsters that emerge from below.

name: Shadowsense.
description: Heighten your talent to save the world.

name: Colonia
description: In this strategy management game, an evil multinational gave you the mandate to build a colony. Create industries, without destroying the environment, manage logistics, manage population, you'll have to serve its interest. Unless your thirst for power leads you to independence…

name: OverNight
description: OverNight is a multiplayer co-op Ghost Hunting horror with multiple Ghosts per session. Explore some of the most haunted locations with your friends, using a variety of paranormal equipment, engage in rituals, and attempt haunted communications to connect with the other side.

name: U96
description: U96 is a action-roguelike about deep sea exploration.

name: Dalo
description: Dalo, a combination of dot and halo. A fun and simple puzzle game where you should find a path that goes through all lines only passing through the same line once.

name: The Snow Fable: Mystery of the Flame
description: Embark on a match-three adventure of breathtaking magic and boundless imagination! A girl embarks on a quest to save her fiery friend. But with each step forward, she draws closer to an encounter with a dark force she could not have conceived!

name: Portal Defense
description: Our game is a basic tower defense game where monsters are coming in through a portal are trying to destroy your tower! The only way to stop them is to send out your units, level up your tower and try to outwit them!

name: Navy War
description: Ready for the naval battle? Online ships are waiting for you!

name: The Secret of Rooms
description: "the Secret of Rooms" is a drama-oriented puzzle-solving game in a modern setting. By searching for the item clues in each room,find the truth of the case in the game.Different choices in the game will unlock different endings and bring players a new puzzle solving experience.

name: Courage
description: "Courage" is a slasher with RPG elements, in a medieval setting, with a dark and gloomy atmosphere. The goal of the game is to advance through the levels and exterminate all the undead, then you can go further.

name: Floor is Lava
description: Floor is Lava, is a 2d platformer where you have to escape an erupting volcano.

name: Ph0b0s
description: Vaporcombat

name: Get Rektorized
description: Set enemies on fire in this action based anti-grav combat racer with an arsenal of heavy and unique weapons! Solve puzzles and gain skills to unlock reinterpreted tracks of old racing games, new ships, never-seen-before racemodes and other surprises. Oh and don't forget to shoot your friends online!

name: Haisonmeguri
description: "Haisonmeguri " is a J-horror walking simulator game based on a terrifying experience involving an abandoned village.

name: WordMaster
description: Create as many words long words as possible within a minute using 7 random letters.

name: Elemates
description: Elemates is an action-adventure game about a rebellious girl out to prove her worth in the heroic trials of her tribe. There, she finds an unlikely ally in her grumpy guide. As a team, prevail through the mighty god Quetzal's temple and use the Band of Humility to unleash powerful, elemental spells.

name: Momo's Conflict
description: Momo was a new nurse at Harukaze Hospital. She was a hard-working girl who took care of her mother. But she had a weakness, a phobia of men. Then one day, she gets transferred to the surgical department after making a mistake. Will she be able to overcome her trauma and save her patients...?

name: DracoFighter
description: DracoFighter is a solo-developed 2D fighting game with a focus on accessibility and local multiplayer, with movesets that are easy to learn but harder to master. Explore the stories of these hand-animated characters in a futuristic world led by dragons!

name: GTTOD: Lost in Reflection
description: Lost in Reflection is the free new GTTOD prologue featuring brand new, exclusive content and the same intense FPS action. Learn where you came from, how you ended up in the chasm, and why all those chads gotta be thwacked.

name: Alien Gladiator
description: Fight for your freedom in space arena!

name: Doctor Nanobot
description: A microbiology themed retro shoot-em-up.

name: Cards of the Dreaming Dragons
description: How well do you know your friends? Cards of the Dreaming Dragons is the ultimate tabletop game you can play with your friends and family. Figure out what they are thinking and deceive them to win.

name: Crate Knight
description: Solve the puzzles by using the environment interactions as Lancelot in this puzzle platformer game. If you find more keys, you will be able to get closer to the more difficult puzzles

name: Barista: Take Away
description: Drag and drop game against the clock, where you will try to make the perfect coffee for each client

name: Cutie Tutti Frutti
description: "Cutie Tutti Frutti" is a game based on "3 in a row" mechanics. The goal of match-3 puzzles is to make groups, lines and rows of 3 or more identical tiles.

name: Platform Roll
description: PlatformRoll is a game with challenging obstacles including bombs, guns and gaps through platforms. Maneuver the ball across all the platforms in the dark with only a little light in order to reach the next level. Compete against an online leaderboard and see how fast you can complete each level.

name: MasterQ
description: The gameplay of "MasterQ" adopts "Loracraft GO" + "can move the ground" gameplay, this is a romantic puzzle adventure game, you will be a red-haired secret agent, in the mysterious unknown forest, your girlfriend was captured by a UFO

name: Defenders of Asteria
description: The time has come to defend your lands from the hordes invading forces. Build up your defenses and summon mighty heroes to aid you as you become one of the Defenders of Asteria!

name: The Creature: Escape Room
description: You are a detective sent to investigate the mistreatment of a mysterious creature. In this escape room there are not only puzzles, but also characters and history.

name: Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator: Scenery - Europe Part 1
description: Expand your Aerofly FS 4 scenery with over 800 detailed European airports, aerial images, building and tree data.

name: My Therapy
description: A visual novel about cute melancholic girls!

name: Pizza Death
description: Grab a slice of this fast-paced, pixel art, top-down shooter.. Pizza Death! Made by members of the Australian thrash band Pizza Death, the main soundtrack is a NES chiptune cover version of their entire debut album, Slice of Death!!!

name: BoxLoop
description: Dive into the world of Time Loop and Evil Boxes.

name: Party Words
description: Party Words is a word party game with a bunch of different game modes and a ton of words to keep it fresh! Pass and play with a single device or join multiple devices to unlock new possibilities. Who's the fastest guesser? Who has all the ideas? Whose doodles are the best? Find out with Party Words.

name: Anon Hacker
description: A comic style first person shooter where you use hacking tools to shoot code at enemies, collect items and complete quests.

name: Pylorus: Footsteps of Greed
description: A free 2d roguelite where enemies form a living ecosystem with rivalries and alliances. This is not your war: scavenge some gold and escape with your life... Or stay longer to uncover secrets and more riches, the choice is yours. Strange things happen to those that follow the footsteps of Greed...

name: Asteroids
description: Another version of the classic Asteroids game

name: Pog 8
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Sunville
description: In our days it’s hard to find any organic grocery’s in markets. Every city turns into concrete jungle, streets are covered with smoke from manufactures and cars. In Sunville everyone can find peace and freedom, take all your savings and went to Sunville to start new free, fresh and bright live.

name: Small Shop
description: Run your own small shop!

name: Aerofly FS 4 Flight Simulator: Scenery - Europe Part 2
description: Expand your Aerofly FS 4 scenery with over 800 detailed European airports, aerial images, building and tree data.

name: Toggle Cube
description: Toggle Cubes is a game where you have to guide people to the stars by toggling cubes on and off. You have to overcome monsters, fireballs, and spikes by using keys and teleports.

name: Chimeras: Wailing Waters - Collector's Edition
description: Can you save the Heavenfall campers from a malevolent force in time?

name: Space Aces
description: Space Aces is a video game made for the spring 2022 offering of CAP 4053 at UCF. The player controls a space fighter capable of movement in 3 directions and rotation in 3 directions. The game supports any controller, keyboard, and the Thrustmaster 1600M flight stick.

name: Porcelain Mask
description: Porcelain Mask - is a platformer where puzzles are combined with action, all for one purpose... to kill you. Everything in this world is reaching out to rip you to shreds just so you don't take the next step. After all, there may be something up ahead...

name: Pandemic 1993
description: Survival horror set in Japan! Fight off various creatures, search for your missing wife and child, and escape from the town safely!

name: Ball Go Home
description: Roll, jump, and fall through over 100 levels in this fun, difficult 2D physics platformer. Master a unique control scheme as you get your ball home!

name: Junkyard War
description: Junkyard War is a unique take on the tower defense genre. Clear trash from the junkyard and recycle it into valuable resources while holding off waves of your competitor's army trying to make the trash disappear by burning it all down!

name: Hack the Babel Inc.
description: A puzzle roguelike game that gives a broad puzzle experience. More than 100 items give additional rules to the base rule like Minesweeper and create a completely different puzzle strategy. Become a hacker and conquer Babel's servers, where randomly generated puzzles await you.

name: Tempusia
description: Based on rewinding time mechanics, Tempusia is the puzzle platformer requiring a big cold head :3

name: Animosa
description: Journey alongside the timid knight through this challenging metroidvania full of unique bosses and dynamic enemies. Build trust, unlock abilities, encourage and explore.

name: Court of Crowns
description: Court of Crowns is a Visual Novel game inspired by Ace Attorney. You play as a Princess Adela de Rex and lead the Crown Curt that resolves important disputes between the Nobility. But what kind of a person is Princess Adela de Rex? Decide that for yourself, thanks to the game's unique Belief System.

name: Fungiman
description: Just a game about a friendly fungus. There's nothing wrong, is it?

name: The Monster Under Your Skin
description: Play as a nameless man who suspects his wife of something, and get lost into his perception of that day when he was about to propose to her. Your choices can influence the the plot. Genre: thriller with some elements of romance.

name: Down n' Up
description: Down n' Up is a platformer where you can't move: you can only jump. In an all-in-one map where many challenges await you, climb higher and higher to reach the top. Be careful not to fall from too high!

name: Mechanic Heroes
description: Build your team of mechanics and work together to repair and deliver as many cars as possible before the time runs out! Playable with up to 4 players, locally or online, Mechanic Heroes will make you love mechanic or simply hate your friends.

name: Orbital Approach
description: Orbital Approach is a Physics based, arcade space game where the highest score rules supreme. Navigate around planets, avoid obstacles, travel through wormholes, and more!

name: Entry
description: Hyperultrasupercasual turn-based game where you should create words by adding letters on the field and using it. The middle of the field is a random word with 5 letters. Every turn you can add only one letter and create only one word. Every letter equal one point, so to win just get more points.

name: Flappy Butt
description: Flap around as buttcheeks propelled by your own gasses whilst trying to dodge pipes!

name: Charging Out Dead Zone
description: This is a zombie car parkour game. The pace of the game is very tight. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible. .

name: Indigo Loop
description: Indigo Loop is a quick-count, time management puzzle game with a splash of strategy and luck. It shares the classic puzzle game spirit of being easy to pick up and challenging to master.

name: A Very Corporate Escape Room
description: This is no ordinary escape room; this is A Very Corporate Escape Room. In this first person 3D puzzle adventure you will solve challenges, unlock secret locations and uncover the dark truth about your manager in a chilling satire of office life.

name: Detective Fantasia DX
description: A corpse has been found on the beach! Explore a summery island to gather clues and uncover the truth in this mystery game, Detective Fantasia DX!

name: Space Assistance
description: Space Assistance - Top Down Shooter, in this game you have to fight off the attacks of spaceships. Repel all their attacks and land on your planet, but there you will find a surprise. The pursuers will not leave you behind, deal with them.

name: Overdriven Evolution
description: Destroy Huge Bosses, dodge thousand of bullets and resolve quick puzzles with your powerfull space ship ! New and remade stages with improved graphics and 3D environments. More enemies and more bullets !

name: Trippy Tavern
description: You are the bartender at Trippy Tavern, serving up colorful drinks to thirsty customers. Use your earnings to learn new recipes and rise the ranks, all while dealing with random mods every round -- some good, some bad, and everything in between! Oh, and don't forget to pay the rent...

name: The Last Winter
description: Experience post apocalyptic Finland in this adventurous survival FPS called The Last Winter. Make your way through snowy wilderness while avoiding getting in trouble with wildlife and other survivors. This story-driven masterpiece won't leave you feeling cold even if the setting might be freezing.

name: Shockwave: Land of the Blind
description: A first-person immersive bomb disposal sim with stealth mechanics that lets you taste the anxious life of a sapper. Work with specialistic equipment to disarm a wide range of explosives. Gather intel to choose the right path in the multi-layered levels and stay out of sight from armed militants.

name: Tactical Bandits
description: Tactical Bandits is an extremely challenging top-down action game where the player travels on a journey to the West Coast to reach the Last Settlement, the last known human survivor camp.

name: Dreams with Furry
description: Dreams with Furry - Cleopatra, Mulan and Joan of Arc are now furry girls! Relaxing gameplay and cute atmosphere.

name: Blocked!
description: Couch multiplayer is back - Blocked! is a local multiplayer party game for up to 8 people that is all about being easy to pick up and start playing. Outsmart your friends in various classic and unique minigames.

name: StarMech
description: Transform your mech to fight, upgrade, and survive long enough to jump to safety in this bullet hell roguelite.

name: Witchhazel Woods
description: Your dog has been kidnapped by a lonely ghost! To save her, you must go on a journey through the woods, helping the creatures you meet along the way.

name: Mother Nature: Balance Broken
description: A Wild West turn-based RPG with a character class system based on the animal kingdom.

name: Sigh of the Abyss
description: Embrace the monster within to change the fate of a nation in this dark fantasy visual novel.

name: Lightfire Defense
description: You are the last Lightfire Keeper. Use the power of the elements to protect your beacon from incoming waves of enemies. Explore mysterious worlds to find a way to prevail over the inevitable.

name: Solar Nations
description: Rule thousands of worlds and conquer thousands more in this unique take on galactic Grand Strategy. Influence your empire's hulking economy in order to accommodate astronomical military might, then wage strategic wars against rivals and anyone else who would dare threaten your splendor.

name: Volunteers
description: This is survival game for one player and for cooperation in 4 players.

name: One Step Away
description: One Step Away is a narrative puzzle game inspired by actual events of child trafficking. Uncover two children's vivid escape stories in this bleak and monochrome world.

name: AirShooShoo
description: AirShooShoo is an online multiplayer arena gravity shooter, where you select your armoury for a fast paced combat against each other. Practice speedrunning in solo mode. Use all your weapons and resources to kill, or die just to respawn instantly for revenge.

name: Witness of the Night
description: Survive the night in an old observatory, helping your friend find the sources of mysterious radiation from outer space.

name: The Game of Fourtune
description: The Game of Fourtune has begun. Play as Clyde Raveron & Devon Rhodes as they try to survive a magical death game on the whims of a god obsessed with four. Four rounds of play, four deaths per round, one survivor granted one wish. Do you have a will strong enough that not even death will stop you?

name: Wormmy
description: Venture out to the planet core to save your cute friends from hunger! Jump, eat and explore, in this platformer game with infinite horizontal levels!

name: The Binding of Survivors
description: A game of rogue adventure, mowing, coolness, and walking. A group of characters of different backgrounds and abilities have come together to explore the deepest secrets of this evil unknown planet. Defeat the tidal wave of enemies, different bosses, and achieve various challenges and achievement.

name: Happy's Clocks
description: Run around an enormous mysterious house that once belonged to your dad, while running away from terrifying monsters and solving interesting puzzles. Discover what happened or maybe what was supposed to happen when you left.

name: Neighbors: Suburban Warfare
description: NEIGHBORS: Suburban Warfare is a lighthearted, team-based PvP game about neighborhood warfare! Deploy traps and barricades to defend your own house. Use the tools from your surroundings to acquire crazy item to get the better of your Neighbors!

name: Stellar Watch
description: Spin and strategize for survival in Stellar Watch, a roguelike tower defense. Steer your ship, unlock tech, and enhance drones to outwit enemies.

name: Rat Chef
description: This game is about you playing like a rat. You own a restaurant, and you have to deliver food to your customers and they will come very fast so hurry up!! At the same time as you keep your restaurant up, you should still make a profit on it so you can pay for the food and bills

name: Periphery
description: A refugee capsule lands on an uninhabited planet. You have to survive, rebuild civilization and, if possible, regain control over the Earth. One big universe, one endless pvp session for all players.

name: Magical Queen's Land
description: Welcome to Magical Queen's Land! Your new part-time cleaning job, clear your way through our gardens, playgrounds and rides as you do your best to finish and leave in time before our fantasy creatures come out to play with the last visitors.. It's just you.

name: Chamrosh
description: Chamrosh, The Guardian Of Persia, turned himself to stone with magic for being immortal to protect persian lands forever, and only kaveh the blacksmith's blood can turn him alive again,after thousand years,after the latest generation of kaveh, you are the only one who can turn him alive.

name: Abyss Fantasia
description: The city "Cynthia" on the edge of the abyss, the "missing" girl who didn't know where she came from began to step into the abyss. Experience the complex emotional, mysterious biological environment under the Abyss. Finally face the deepest darkness of the abyss.

name: Juicy Futa
description: A lewd Visual-Novel about Futas on an open island

name: SCP: Intrusion
description: SCP: Intrusion is a tactical first person shooter that takes place in the SCP universe. Two factions (Foundation Forces and Chaos Insurgency) fight to the death over the control of an SCP facility.

name: Cyber City Clash
description: Cyber City Clash is a 2.5D fighting in a near future dystopian setting. Battle your way through the various environments of the Cyberpunk city in either single player vs AI, or against a friend in 2 player modes.

name: Aria and the Crystal Kingdom
description: Wield cards as your weapon in this deck-building fantasy RPG inspired by Slay the Spire and Paper Mario! Battle against enemies in strategic turn-based combat, travel across a hand-drawn world, customize your deck, and grow strong enough to face whatever lies ahead!

name: Retrowave Rider
description: Retrowave Rider is a mash up of Geometry Dash and Guitar Hero. Dive into synthwave worlds filled with retro-inspired visuals and smooth synth sounds, and experience this journey with all of its trials and glories.

name: Alone Again: The Countryside
description: You live in Caçapava, in an isolated neighborhood, in the countryside. In Brazil, carrying guns is forbidden. Mysterious creatures move around your house, you can’t protect yourself… Reach them or they will reach you!

name: Stoney's Adventure
description: A 2D Puzzle Action Platformer set in a fully explorable world and beyond.

name: Urchins and Ink
description: Urchins & Ink is a twin shooter with a twist! Learn how to properly read and pronounce Japanese while fighting off pesky sea urchins. Help Sumi learn the language and unlock new levels to challenge fluency. Swim quick and think but don't lose your ink to prove practice makes perfect!

name: Kingdom's Edge
description: An adventure multiplayer hack n slash in a vertical world. Explore the Deepth with your class to earn knowlodge and recources to build your domain. Play with up to 2 of your Steam firends or solo. The characters have 4 abilities with combos and can be upgraded along the game.

name: Tirsy's Tale
description: As the Age of Dragons comes near an end, join young Tirsy on a great journey to the Land Beyond. Traverse vast locations full of challenges from hostile creatures to nature itself. Meet companions along the way to assist you in reaching the valley of the Drahkin, who harness the power of the dragon.

name: The Shadelight
description: Shadelight is a horror game set in Louisiana. Hide and sneak to avoid mutant family. Find nesesary items to leave their mansion.

name: Deer Journey
description: Deer Journey is a third person walking simulator game. Outcasted by the other deers, an albino fawn is forced to go deep into the forest to find a place to live. Join him on his journey through a world too big for which he may not be yet ready.

name: Candy Girlfriend
description: A fantasy trip to the candy kingdom that belongs to you~ Will you meet the girl you want?

name: Adventure Forever
description: The Infinite RPG.

name: The Creepy Syndrome
description: The Creepy Syndrome is an anthology that offers several psychological horror stories, with different pixel art and retro 1 bit, 8 bit, gameboy, etc. styles. Stories of a disturbed mind that intertwine with each other while being analysed by a mysterious psychiatrist.

name: Lands of Crown
description: A rogue-like in a medieval, randomly-generated world. Fight, talk, steal, cast spells, complete quests, level up, acquire loot and conduct trades, all to take the Crown. Where Streets of Rogue meets Kenshi, choose your own play style and play as any class, if you can meet them, you can be them!

name: We See You
description: We See You is a rhythm based down-scrolling runner. You play as a pair of eyes trying to go as deep as possible, avoiding enemies moving in different patterns with a goal to get a good score to top the leaderboard.

name: Waitventure
description: Idle RPG with automatic battles, enemy recruiting and fusions.

name: Miss Neko 3
description: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the psychedelic city — Neko City#96572! All good things you want will happen here! Just dance with the charming neko, solve their match puzzles, and you will get mysterious rewards!

name: Fateless Night
description: Fateless Night - is a 2D action platformer where enemies are randomly generated. It is perfect for players who don't really like rogue-lite conventions, such as losing most of game progression after each death.

name: Reign of Dwarf
description: Survive, farm, and conquer, that's the philosophy of Reign of Dwarf. We provide you the tools, you choose how to use them. Go to war, make alliances, or hide away from the world, the only morals will be the ones you choose.

name: Alabama Bones Adventures
description: Alabama Bones is a classic point and click adventure, streamlined for the modern age. Explore locations across continents and solve simple puzzles to return a variety of museum artifacts to their original owners.

name: Tater Spud
description: Explore, fight, and platform through a world of deadly plants as a lone potato, Tater Spud, in search of powerups and the answers behind the flora that was once safe.

name: Push the Blocks
description: Move the main block to the "X" of the stage. To do this, push some blocks, blow up others, and solve thought-provoking puzzles. Let's relax and burn some neurons?

name: Game Cycle
description: Relive the bygone era of CD-ROM shareware! As a recently-contracted games analyst, you are tasked by the CEO of Best Value Games to make sure the games set to be included in their upcoming release are up to code. How much you get paid depends on how much ground you cover!

name: Tentacles Party With Nuns
description: Carissa, the most popular nun at St. Esther’s Cathedral, had a dream one night about a witch being abused by the Knights Templar and woke up to find the whole church in a strange atmosphere.

name: Godumas
description: Godumas is a co-op horror game for 1-4 players. Explore the strange island, search for items, run or sneak your way through local inhabitants and find a way to escape… before you are sacrificed.

name: Leapgate
description: In this sci-fi match-3 roguelite, equip your ship and match in battle to energise your systems, as you leap across the galaxy to save your faction!

name: Betrix
description: Rhythm Tetris - fusing Tetris with Music. Tap rhythm with harddrop, and feel melody with stack. Create your own level and share it with other Players.

name: Forgotten Legends
description: Forgotten Legends is a virtual trading card game, based off of MMO/MOBA style combat. You will need to build a team that can win together and take Victory from your enemies!

name: Jumping Jazz Cats
description: Play, race and hang with your feline friends in this online platformer party game! Purrfect your pussycat parkour as you sprint, jump, bounce, swing, skid and slide through a collection of collaborative and competitive mini-games set in a grandiose cartoon mansion. Get jumpin', jazz cats!

name: Solo War Medieval
description: Solo War Medieval is a first-person shooter game like no other. You need to survive against infinite amount of knights alone, but modern weapons would help you a bit. Modern weapons vs. medieval knights - what would be outcome?

name: Hyperland
description: Pick up, fire and dodge the bombs! An action-packed multiplayer casual shooter with basic moves but still easy to play.

name: Sexy Sharks
description: Short Adult-Only Visual Novel featuring 3 shark girls on the beach with different personalities and fetishes.

name: Quest: Escape Dungeon
description: Join the group of adventurers in the quest for treasures! Solve puzzles and fight the dungeon guards to find the cave full of gold and get back home safely.

name: Beltex
description: Beltex is a casual factory game played on a hex map. Extract numbers. Combine them using mathematical operations. Deliver them using belts across a huge map. Unlock new buildings and upgrades.

name: Near the Fear
description: Roguelite racing game set in surreal world of subconscious. Lost in dark corners of your mind, set out on a journey to rekindle forgotten light and find your way home.

name: Sprite Fight
description: An action-based 2D platform fighter with the use of long-ranged combat and the ability to battle your friends. With a series of unique game modes to brawl out in multiplayer, acquire a series of weapons throughout a variety of stages to fend off your opponents and come out victorious.

name: Crossfar
description: Fight in massive, fast-paced PVP battles with hardcore team tactics in zero gravity! Choose from five drone classes upon respawns and put your spectacular pilot skills on display to defend your gate, destroy or sneak past the enemy defenses, cross the field and breach the enemy gate on the far side.

name: Epic Party Quest
description: A retro-themed party game for up to 4 players, in which each player takes the role of various now-retired fantasy heroes and relive the story of their epic adventures in a series of highly competitive, fast-paced mini-games.

name: Fight Club: All Stars
description: Absolutely accurate and totally precise physics based ragdoll fighting)))

name: Super Kit: To the Top
description: Leap. Fight. Explore. Experience Lightning Fast VR Parkour in Super Kit: To the Top.

name: Soul Link
description: Soul Link is a challenging puzzle game where you use your intelligence to build bridges with falling pieces of various shapes. Reconnect this broken land with Soul Bridges, and make the world whole again!

name: Collision
description: Daniel has grown up in the Thick Oak Forest for years, living with his mother and father. His father, Oliver, was drafted into war four years before the events of Collision. His father disappears just a few hours before coming home. Solve his murder in a beginner friendly, turn based RPG.

name: Barricade
description: Barricade is a zombie horde shooter with a classic 90's feel. Players use objects to build a barricade that protects their only source of upgrades. Endless waves of zombies will exploit weaknesses in your defenses. Will you juggle building, shooting, and repairing, or be overrun?

name: Solomon Snow: First Contact
description: Sometimes when you come to work, the Solar System is under attack. Glakmirk battle cruiser has landed on Neptune and portals to the other planets are open, and as Solomon Snow - an ordinary security worker, have to deal with an alien army coming out of the gateway in the Futuresalt Corp.

name: Paradise Cleaning: Me and my Doctor's Life in the Hospital
description: Paradise Cleaning: Me and my Doctor's Life in the Hospital is super-casual action game. All you have to do is just cleaning out all dirty icons by dragging over them within the time limit. There are 5+1 dirty icons and each of them can be cleaned by the corresponding Cleaning tools.

name: Scranny
description: Scranny has locked you in her house... best of luck escaping !!

name: Regular Luckiest Guy: Love & Blocks
description: Regular Luckiest Guy: Love & Blocks is a Brick Breaker ecchi game. You’re just a regular guy, who just happens to be around eight beautiful girls. You can learn their stories, break through the layers of their hearts and win their love. Play your shots right and you will... uncover all their secrets.

name: Elvera
description: Welcome into the realm of ELVERA, an Indie Third-Person PvP Action Game passionately developed by a single developer.

name: Albert Innovation
description: Albert Innovation is an immersive, narrative linear horror game, where you will attempt to unravel the mysteries of what was once the most brilliant technological innovation company of the olden days. Manipulate machines, run away, and put an end to this nightmare.

name: Cosmopoly
description: Cosmopoly is a multiplayer board game for 1-6 players. Play with friends, buy planets and space stations, participate in auctions and trade, build upgrades and become dominant in space.

name: Incoherence
description: Incoherence is a fragmented first-person point and click mystery game. Enter the mind of Jason Bethlam as you awake to a brightly lit room. Piece together fragments of your life and escape.

name: Count Pumpcula
description: Embark on an exciting 2D-Metroidvania journey through the Eastern Archipelago of Lanthir Range! Along the way you’ll need to save the Sagelings from a dark curse in the forest of Orn, fight prehistoric creatures that were thought to be extinct, escape the beasts that lie within the Isle of Orad, and slide through the icy catacombs of Krakens Pass. In your down time, relax with charming new companions on the enchanting Island of Travellers Cove.

name: Cowboy Hell
description: Cowboy Hell is a top-down, bullet hell shooter following a recently deceased cowboy and his horse as he adventures through a vibrant open world. Shoot cows, dodge bullets, collect guns, solve puzzles, and befriend characters as you work towards defeating Jeff Bezos himself!

name: University Stories
description: University Stories - an exciting animated game with lots of different girls. Go on dates with girls and win their hearts.

name: Scarpone Scamps
description: A gritty, semi-kinetic visual novel about broken people and notorious gangsters, featuring six individualized routes with six different endings.

name: Shattered Heaven
description: Shattered Heaven is a single-player deck builder card game with RPG elements and an ambitious branching narrative, set in a dark fantasy world. The game focuses on a card game and roguelike gameplay fueled by a great replay value, thanks to procedural dungeons, a deep crafting system.

name: Return to the Skyway
description: Traverse through a fantastical island and utilize the local fauna to destroy obstacles. In this 2D platform, the player controls a character that has crash landed on a tropical island. Complete puzzles utilizing the creatures' unique abilities in order to fix their ship and return to the Skyway!

name: Grandmother's Gift
description: Tomorrow is Winnie's 12th birthday, but when she wakes up, she seems to have entered another world, incredible dolls, people who have long since passed away, is all this a dream or a reality?

name: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy
description: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy is a indie game developed by GAMEPULSE. You play as the Touhou famous character Cirno, become a hero, and embark on her journey to liberate the Gensoukyo and save her dear princess.

name: Watashi no Kokoro ha Kirei desu ka: Am I Kind Hearted?
description: The heroines are left to pay for the treatment of a strange disease!? They have taken on shady jobs at night without the protagonist's knowledge…all while not knowing that it was actually a misdiagnosis.

name: Hanaja's Body
description: You know what they say: Revenge has a way of changing you. Fight enemies and traverse strange, unique worlds while being slowly transformed by powerful attacks and obstacles which change with you! Turn the tide on those kinky foes by powering up your body with special augments in this fetish RPG.

name: Snacky Tower
description: Defeat enemies in a rock-paper-scissors style combat to clear every room. Your steps are limited, so plan carefully and puzzle your way to the top of Snacky Tower! Use gold to increase your chances to win or beat your highscore in endless mode.

name: Katana Rama
description: A mobility based, fast paced action game where you play as a hacker program, with the mission of breaking out of a digital security system. Coming to Steam 2022.

name: Animal Wish
description: If you have long dreamed of taking a break from the hustle and bustle of the city or becoming a real farmer for one day, enjoying the gifts of nature, then welcome to the animal farm!

name: Restart Your Life Adventures of Tylenol
description: Embark on your adventures in the fantastical land of Tenot. The mystical power of tarot will guide you to eradicate evil and darkness after your reincarnation. To be a great warrior, to increase your strength, to explore the unknown, to give you infinite joy. A Rougelike turn-based FTB game.

name: Special Gulag Rescue Operation
description: When the barbarians came and took away your people and put them in gulags, you knew you had to put down your wrench and pick up a gun! Play as an ordinary mechanic from Mariupol in this procedurally generated top-down shooter.

name: Prototypers
description: An arcade-style controller-friendly physics-based RTS game

name: SpaceKraft!
description: Explore the space and go for new adventures with this physics based space game! Discover steampunk themed planets, solve puzzles, gather resources, craft machines & systems and have fun with gravity in an open-world galaxy. Refuel, repair and upgrade your ship to find your way back to mother earth.

name: Heavy Burden
description: Explore the world in an abstract first-person platformer, immerse yourself in the game's philosophical meanings to awaken your desire to think.

name: Dragon's Dilemma
description: Journey forth from your cave in this satirical visual novel starring a grumpy dragon! Encounter all sorts of people, obtain companions, and go on dates as you try to clear your (relatively) good name. Includes branching dialog, mini-games, and much more.

name: Propeller King
description: Be the propeller king in the battleground! 8 vs 8 matches with online players or bots, destroy the enemy and capture their bases to win!

name: Big Flying Asteroid
description: A fun little space shooter inspired by the 1979 classic Asteroids.

name: Rasetsu Fumaden
description: In the Edo period, in a world where demons, humans, and gods exist together, Rasetsu Raki, a princess of the demon tribe who possesses great sealing powers, helps people and defeats the enemies by skillfully using various 'sword techniques' and 'barrier techniques'.

name: Deadnaut: Signal Lost
description: Deadnaut: Signal Lost is a sci-fi horror turn-based roguelike where loyalty isn't earned - it's installed. Scavenge derelict ships and abandoned moons filled with hellish creatures, brutal AI and insanity storms. Gather gear and upgrades to fight or evade the hi-tech supersoldiers hunting you down.

name: Raifu Wars: Puska Character
description: Unlock Puska as a new playable character in Raifu Wars!

name: Light Maze
description: A simple casual game where you light up floor tiles in a level in order to go to the next level.

name: Fetus
description: Fetus is an arcade hardcore platformer set in ancient Rome.

name: Knights of the Kitchen Table
description: Giant food monsters are attacking! As a Knight of the Kitchen Table, it is your sworn duty to defeat them in this action-adventure, hack-and-slash, souls-like game!

name: Ukrainien Agent
description: You play as a Ukrainian intelligence agent. Having penetrated into the lair of the enemy, you have to do a heroic deed, to divert to themselves the maximum attention.

name: Pact
description: Build your alliance of evil as you regain your lost power in this classically-inspired fantasy RTS. Choose how your enthusiastically loyal minions will build, plunder, and pillage their way across an ever-shifting battlefield, guiding them to new opportunities and allies on your path to domination.

name: Chasing Halo
description: It is a team tactical competitive shooting game,which has forged vehicles, novel playing methods,exquisite pictures and shocking scenes. In the tripartite battle of virtual history, we will break through the siege,use exquisite strategies to sweep away thousands of troops and be the winner.

name: SnowBrawl
description: A multiplayer snowball fighting game! Choose from different hero characters, team up with ur friends and best the opposing team in familiar game modes!

name: Planet S
description: Planet S is a real-time strategy game where your goal is to colonize multiple planets in a solar system to advance your civilization, build a city and supply it to grow your faction.

name: Neet
description: Alone on Halloween? How pathetic. Learn and choose how to live your sorry life, talk to a series of surreal visitors and witness the unspeakable in this highly interactive, soulful and atmospheric life simulator.

name: Island Elf
description: "Island Elf" is a life simulation game where you will live with a hot red-haired elf on an island...

name: Castaway of the Ardusta Sea
description: Going on another solo adventure, Aisha sets off by ship. Unfortunately, a sudden storm and the incursion of a giant sea monster hinders her path. Through the turmoil, she is thrown overboard and wakes up on an unknown island. Aisha must find her way home and survive the pirates and monsters that lurk both above ground and in the deep.

name: Bots City
description: Artificial intelligence is out of control. Only a Hero can stop this madness. The Hero's goal is to get to the main computer and disable it, thereby disabling all robots. Our hero has only one weapon, but that won't stop him!

name: Space Monkeys
description: Space Monkeys is a solo-developed, fast-paced action game where you must unleash your inner ape to face 12 unique levels in space. Use skill and strategy to dodge lasers, evade enemies, and collect bananas in zero-gravity on your journey to escape a retro-styled evil space station.

name: Lost Dream: Memories
description: Lost Dream Is back bigger than ever! Explore the world as a cute little fox and go on a mission to find your forgotten piece.

name: Smokyflex
description: Sin descripción

name: Perfect Partner
description: Perfect Partner is a party game with 2 people work closely together to defeat other teams to win. The road to the championship is full of obstacles, your teammates may be your worst enemy! Have fun in this game or meet the soul mate you are most acquainted with here.

name: Workaholic
description: Workaholic is a frantic rouge-lite FPS where you go on a rampage through a hellish office space as your grasp on reality crumbles.

name: Caged Beast
description: Caged Beast is a dynamic arena shooter where you play as a robot that destroys everything in its path.

name: Pop Bowling VR
description: Realize bowlingl sports in VR! 4 stages of realistic scenes (classic bowling zone / rock bowling zone, beach bowling zone / holloween bowling zone) Play from 1 to 4 players on a single device.

name: Sword and Fairy Inn 2
description: “Swords and Fairy Inn2 ” is a game developed by Softstar Entertainment. It includes the type of RPG, casual, simulation in it. Many roles of Sword and Fairy series come from different place to work in this Inn, live and build a warm peace family together.

name: Crash Course
description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Sexy's
description: Welcome to your new summer job at the Sexy Fucking Club, where men come to have a good time! The main attraction, of course, is the new generation of sex dolls. These are animatronic robots programmed to do whatever you want!

name: White Paper
description: What is your subconscious mind trying to tell you when you are mindlessly drawing on a piece of paper? Maybe someone trapped there, in a dark, damp basement and yes, screaming for help and trying to break out?

name: Burning Requiem: Fates
description: "Burning Requiem: Fates" is a new 2-On-2 Indie Fighting Game produced by Project Requiem! Seeking to shake up the fighting game formula to bring some new flair! Featuring characters coming from the new tie in webcomic series of "Burning Requiem"!

name: Spiderbro
description: Help Spiderbro through a strange dystopia and overcome the shadow spider that is constantly hindering you. Collect items and solve puzzles and keep moving, don't let the shadow spider get the better of you.

name: Red Tower
description: The most violent creatures from darkness were arrested inside the Red Tower. An evil force capable of destroying it was discovered, putting all of mankind at risk. Shoot the monsters, upgrade your weapons, rise to more challenging levels, and destroy 'em all 'til not a single one is left!

name: Magic vs Zombies
description: Simple game of shooting magic projectiles to kill zombies and level up to get stronger and kill more zombies.

name: Night Blood: Avenger's Tide
description: "Night Blood: Avenger's Tide" is a side-scrolling action game that takes place in the world's most prosperous city, Atlandi. Players need to control Mark to find his own past, break through the enemy's siege, and finally uncover the huge conspiracy hidden behind the crisis.

name: Turbo Light Rush
description: Automatic Run&Gun containing 12 levels with retro-futuristic aesthetics. Make the best score !

name: Kinkoi: Golden Time
description: Welcome to Noble Private Academy, an institution that cultivates the wealthiest, most well-connected students in all of Japan! At this boarding school, one must be willing to accept all of its refined and dignified teachings or be met with strict opposition!

name: Ultimate Cartridge Collection Deluxe
description: Play three different games in this game compilation! Experience three different adventures filled with colorful characters and various mechanics to solve puzzles and avoid dangers. Maybe what you learn in these games will come in handy somewhere else...

name: Heal & Hurt
description: Heal & Hurt is a fast-paced old-school arena shooter where you switch sides from angel to skeleton and vice versa every time you die! Both characters have unique abilities that you can use to outclass your opponents. You should also pay attention to damage types as you can either heal or hurt your enemies (and yourself!)

name: The Corpse Crusade
description: Dark fantasy pixelart hack-and-slash adventure set in a world full of bizarre demons and even more fearsome zealots. Lead a troop of Santifrancan crusaders in a fight against heretics & demons while unraveling a sinister conspiracy.

name: Doki Doki House
description: Doki Doki House is a dating sim that takes place in beautiful Australia on the Gold Coast. In this game you play as the heroine, which suddenly becomes the temporary owner of a guest house. Fall in love with these characters and experience the interesting story of your very own guest house!

name: Grief
description: A short visual novel about the day to day life of a grieving women. Join her story and make the right decisions so she can get out of a cycle that seems to have no end.

name: Maelstrom Legacy: Tesla Mystery
description: Maelström Legacy: The Tesla Mystery is a Point & Click / Puzzle game, where you lead the investigation in an anachronistic Paris where Nikola Tesla, organizer of the Scientific Congress, has disappeared. Investigate and unravel the secrets of a steampunk and Art Nouveau Paris...

name: Captain Gazman: Day of the Rage
description: New third-person beat'em up with shooter elements from the makers of December 24th! Mafia clan Nilgor is looking for a driver. But he finds himself embroiled in a war between the Nilgors and Gareses. Take control of Montana or Kurbon and take part in the biggest crime showdown of those years!

name: Real Rage
description: Are you too calm? Do you want to be angry? If the answer is yes, you have to play this game! You have to use all of your skills to complete the stages, and defeat the boss. There are many traps, enemies, and other surprises on every level. The deathcounter is waiting for you!

name: Qabara the Artist
description: An RPG adventure about the world's most anxious 9-year-old painter.

name: V.A Proxy
description: V.A Proxy is an openworld metrovania with a fast-paced action rpg combat like Nier, it follows the story of three last machines of their kind as they fight the corrupt ridden world and unravel the fate of their makers to decide the future of all remaining life forms.

name: Pigface Massacre
description: Pigface Massacre is a survival horror game can be played up-to 4 players. While trying to stay alive, uncover the serial killer Pigface's bloodcurdling mystery and find out the truth behind events.

name: Aero Tales Online: The World
description: Aero Tales Online is a new free-to-play Anime MMORPG featuring fantastic PvP and PvE features. You will find yourself in a mysterious story of the Key of Skylight. Choose your side, customize your character and enjoy the journey of Aero World!

name: Regular Human Workshop
description: Regular Human Workshop is a 2D physics simulation sandbox. There are no predefined goals or objectives. Simply throw objects into the world and interact with them in various ways.

name: Dick Ranger
description: Experience an amazing adventure with Dick Ranger, who set off in search of his lost father William, a valued explorer and anthropologist. Travel with the hero through different lands and places.

name: Turf Wars: A Snail Escape
description: Escape the garden in this snail-paced rougelike where you got to expand your turf or dry out trying. Danger lurks behind every bush, so just remember this one important rule: Stay. on. yellow!

name: Atama
description: Use physic powers in Atama to see through the eyes of your pursuers to avoid detection as you investigate a cursed rural Japanese village. You can't fight back; you must rely only on your powers and your wits to avoid your enemies. Inspired by Forbidden Siren and Junji Ito.

name: Meteoric VR
description: Meteoric VR is a low poly first-person space shooter where your mission is to protect the planet from incoming meteors.

name: Dango!
description: Dango! is a casual liquid puzzle game. You need to pass a variety of levels, draw a path through which the liquid will flow and fill the vessel.

name: Graveyard Girls
description: Graveyard Girls is a halloween-themed yuri visual novel about complicated grief and overcoming hardships. Collect Elle’s “scribbles” to learn about her struggles, befriend a mysterious girl, and have a conversation about death.

name: Ballex 2: The Hanging Gardens
description: Ballex² is a third-person rolling ball game, the sequel to Ballex. You will control a ball, enjoy the scenery of the four seasons, overcome obstacles and solve various puzzles.

name: Autonauts vs Piratebots
description: Create, automate and defend an impenetrable base. Assemble and command a Bot army to combat an entire Piratebot invasion. Build, program and battle your way through five different zones.

name: Chef: A Restaurant Tycoon Game - Pizza & Baked Goods
description: It's time to raise the temperature and fly to a new dimension of baking! With Chef: Pizza & Baked Goods, it is finally possible to put pineapple on pizza!

name: HuntForOut
description: HuntForOut is a survival FPS game, where your main goal is to get out from The Labyrinth before it collapses. The task won't be easy; there are a lot of dangers in this mysterious place, and the walls are always moving to harden your way…

name: Elimination
description: Elimination is an online, multiplayer, competitive action platform game. Use all sorts of cartoon weapons at your disposal to help you along the way in this fast-paced, arena-style online game. Just remember, the only way to victory is through elimination.

name: I Love Finding More Pups
description: Travel through all new locations as you befriend and adopt all new pups!

name: Room 12
description: You wake up in a place where all life forms want to kill you, and you don't remember anything. As you try to find clues about this place and your memory loss, a voice on the other end of a radio will try to help you out.

name: Afterdream
description:
Afterdream is a 2D psychological horror adventure game.

Navigate the obscure location populated by ghosts, and collect items to solve puzzles as you move further through the intriguing story. Look through the lens of your strange camera and photograph highlighted objects to interact with them.

name: Three Skies
description: Three Skies is a story driven strategic RPG with challenging non-linear dungeons, turn-based elemental combat, and highly customizable heroes.

name: Ceaseless
description: 'Ceaseless' is a top-down action game designed with minimalist pixel graphics, with over 10 playable characters to choose from. Each level is complete with unrelenting enemies, enticing potential items, and a uniquely crafted score. Are you ready to brave the tower?

name: Droned
description: Droned is a small, passion project that brings friends together for some good old fashion action. In that spirit, get your friends online and hop straight in some top-down combat.

name: Forever Lost
description: Who are you...and what happened at Hawthorne Asylum? Find the answers in Forever Lost, a puzzle-based, psychological horror adventure through a dark, forgotten landscape.

name: A Crown of Thorns
description: A Cyberpunk visual novel in a post Apocalyptic world that is a cross between Sin City and Blade Runner. Based on the IP of the 3 time award nominated feature film script entitled “Blade n Blood” .

name: Stu: The First AI
description: Stu: The First AI is a Metroidvania set in the digital world of computers and the internet. Exploration is the heart of the game. Discover a vast world with new forms of digital life and humans struggling to control them.

name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line: Nottingham - Lincoln Route
description: Explore the eastern reaches of Midlands territory with Just Trains’ latest addition to their Midland Main Line network, which spans 34 miles from Nottingham to Lincoln!

name: Planetary Exploration Company
description: Fight aliens as your explore planets, collect resources to build tools and items, while you manage your company and try to survive.

name: Repetendium
description: Fight against an army of elemental creatures hell bent on your destruction. Compete with other players on the leaderboards to show who is the master of Repetendium!

name: Elfheim: Chapter 1
description: Elfheim is a magical land beyond your wildest dreams! The king of the Slimes unexpectedly sets on an exciting adventure filled with lewd Elves, underlying mysteries and lighthearted fun!

name: Planet Zoo: Conservation Pack
description: Introducing the Planet Zoo: Conservation Pack! Learn about the critical role zoos take in helping the planet as you expand your own zoo with five endangered animals: Przewalski’s horse, amur leopard, scimitar-horned oryx, siamang, and axolotl.

name: Midnight Memories
description: A game with a mixture of melancholy and action. Where your main objective is to recover your memory and find your friends.

name: De'Vine: Heavenly Acres
description: Welcome to your farm on Heavenly Acres! Farmland that presents many opportunities. Harvest trees & plants. Grow Crops. Romance with other misfits. Collect up to 200 unique monsters and compete with monster battles! Indulge in the underground for buried treasure and dangerous monsters!

name: The Nameless Braves: Heaven
description: The Nameless Braves is a kinetic-style Visual Novel. Set in the fantasy continent of Ankh-Seah during a dour era referred to as "The Dark Age", one young man strives through trials and heartbreak to accomplish his dream of becoming a hero.

name: Western Dual Wield
description: Western theme Voxel Graphics Forced-scrolling twin-stick shooter

name: Otoko Cross: Pretty Boys Klondike Solitaire
description: Meet 5 cute cross-dressing characters as they challenge you to classic solitaire! Win with the cards you're dealt and unlock new outfits for your companions in this this celebration of Japanese "otokonoko" style and sub-culture.

name: The Tale of Treasonous Tom
description: The current King of Dilford in the Land of Pilfered is jolly old King Palaverous. What a putz! Using whatever means necessary, you must rise from amongst a heap of friggin' idiots to claim the throne. There are those who call you...Tom?

name: Nightmare Rooms VR
description: How did you end up here exactly? There's something familiar about this whole place, as if you've been here in your dreams... or nightmares! So many empty rooms... You must be the only one down here, right?

name: XP Soccer
description: XP Soccer is a game designed to look and feel like your favourite soccer games from the NES era!

name: Godtail
description: After what seems like a dull day of school and track practice, Violet overhears some conversation about some monster sightings. Afterward, her friend Hannah tells Violet to let loose and pay no attention to it – but maybe she should have.

name: Rage Rabbit
description: Rage Rabbit is a fast paced platform game set on an island haunted by mysterious shadows. Shoot down your enemies, explore an interconnected world, defeat powerful bosses and obtain new power ups.

name: Dr. Chatelet: Faith
description: Amputations, bloodletting, alchemy - all of which seem unthinkable today - were the treatment options that medieval doctors revered. You must face challenges one after another and experience gains and losses in the course of your constant adventures

name: Lost Life: Origins
description: "Lost Life" is an indie horror project where you have a chance to explore a foggy town full of mysteries. A place where worlds collide ready for you to reveal their secrets.

name: Five Nights at Floppa 0
description: You got a job as a security guard at an insurance company, but it turns out that it's not all that easy. After all, your tasks are not only to protect the office, but also to protect yourself!

name: SG Racing
description: A future-retro racing arcade game

name: Haunted Places
description: Survive in the radioactive zone and fight off all the monsters in your way. With you you have only a pistol and a little cartridge.

name: Cleaning the System
description: Get to the end of the level as fast as possible by mastering the mechanics of this out of control platformer.

name: The Backroom: Lost and Found
description: The Backroom: Lost and Found tells the story of a room in the backrooms. Can you keep your sanity, bring the lost together, and find your way out?

name: Hordound
description: Hordound is a mysterious and prosperous city full of puzzles and mysteries. But the darkness broke out and enveloped the city, hiding it under water.

name: A Loney
description: Welcome to the fantasy world of A Loney. Get ready for an exciting adventure with the main character! The world is filled with various creatures threatening the world! Grab your sword and deal with them!

name: Hanako in the Abandoned School
description: This is a walking simulator game where the story takes place in an abandoned school.You must escape the curse of Hanako and escape alive.Explore the school and collect the materials left behind to uncover what once happened in this school and find a way to escape.

name: Game Over
description: An adventure RPG with rhythm based combat encounters, zany characters, moral conundrums and platforming elements? Oh sorry I didn't know this was a question. Yes.

name: Kaz's Adventure
description: Traverse Through 5 Beautifully Designed Worlds With Over 30 Fun And Exciting Levels And Tons Of Post Game Content To Enjoy In Kaz's Adventure!

name: My Dystopian Robot Girlfriend
description: Extremely unique lewd simulator game. Try to survive in a dystopian world with a very advanced and customisable sexbot you found in a ditch. Earn money with streaming, gambling, stocks or hard work and try to maintain your sanity. P.S. Sexbots are now illegal!

name: MrFox
description: "MrFox" is is a classic 2D side-scrolling platformer. To collect all lost treasures you will visit three different colorful locations.

name: Zombies Midnight
description: "Zombies Midnight" is a top-view 2D survival game. At night zombies come out of the forests and want to eat you and you need to stay alive, managing your shelter and resources.

name: Ultra Ninja Shooter
description: Ultra Ninja Shooter is a physics-based shooting game where you strike ninja stars to destroy the targets. Throw out your shuriken and eliminate all the enemies!

name: Kokoro's Gensokyo Journey: The Lost Masks

description: The ashen lands of Svardjäll bear the marks of a violent draconic warfare and years of violent volcanic eruptions. Those who survived these horrific events are now known as the Scorched.

name: Dino Safari: E-Pro
description:
​On Jurassic Safari adventures like this you will discover wild and deadly dino carnivores:
TRex, Spinosaurus, Velociraptors, Stegosaurus, Raptors, Euoplocephalus Triceratops, Pterodactyl, Dilophosaurus, Parasaurolophus, Brontosaurus, Gigantic Worm, Plesiosaur, Compsognathus, Allosaurus, Dunkleosteus, Sarcosuchus, Achelousaurus, Deinonychus, Nodosaur, Medusaceratops, Giganotosaurus, Torosaurus, Edmontonia and Pentaceratops.
​

name: Zombicide: Tactics & Shotguns
description:
Discover a new single-player adventure based on the famous survival board game!
In their quest for ever greater productivity, humans have genetically altered plants and animals, creating a new world infested by...Zombies!

name: Tweet Hunter!
description: Tweet Hunter! is a simple exiting hunting action role playing game!

name: Biofrenzy HD
description: Biofenzy HD is a fast-paced side scrolling action game optimized for iPhone 4 retina display.

name: Call of Dungeon: Devil's Quest
description:
An ordinary miner got into a devil's den because he wanted to become wealthy. He can get out of this trap only if he collects all the artifacts for Mephistopheles. You can help him by completing all the quests created by the magic cube. The main hero's life entirely depends on you!

Are you ready for an exciting yet challenging adventure? Start collecting the artifacts now!

name: Paintings
description: A tiny memory.

name: Non-Binary
description: "Non-Binary" is a video game that mixes text choices and bullet hell to tell the story of two non-binary people's journey of self-discovery. Make your choices. Dodge words. Go through things that hurt without breaking down. If you can.

name: The Mars Files
description: A text based survival game with a great storyline that unfolds as you advance in the game. You play as a colonist trapped on Mars that must save other astronauts, build a base and explore the planet to discover its secrets. An AI robot guides and helps you operate the lifeboat and scout the planet that hosts hundreds of dangerous aliens.

name: Elexi
description: Spelling words. Scoring points. A board full of tiles with letters on them. Seems pretty simple, right? But for every word spelled, there's a cost. A choice. A letter that has to be thrown away. And the choices get more and more difficult until the letters run out and there are no more choices left.

name: UniverseV: Star Domination
description:
Conquer the galaxy and defeat the mysterious elder race in this amazing 2D turn-based strategy game. To do this, you will have to build your own fleets with different ships equipped with modules of your choice. Your conquest will be supported by special game cards different for each race. These game cards can dramatically change the situation on the battlefield.
You will be able to play 5 different normal races, and 2 extra races. Each race has its own ships, modules for these ships, and game cards that really can be the game changers. You will have to fight in 6 completely different arenas where each arena has its own special abilities that dramatically can change your strategy during the battle.

name: Pizza Jump
description: Be on high alert as the pizza boxes come flying at you at high rates of speed! Tap to jump the Pizza up and see how high you can climb!

name: Pocket Button Soccer
description: You move (kick) the ball by tapping and holding your finger over one of the players. Flick your finger in desired direction of where you want to aim the ball. The length and direction of your finger move will control the speed and direction of the ball.

name: Ackeron
description: Launched into space to find technologies from distant stars, you are humanities last hope of salvation. But the civilization you find is teetering on the brink, all but destroyed by an alien scourge. Can you help them recover their lost power so that they can help you save the Earth? Trade or fight or conquer arenas as you explore an alien world.

name: Star Gunner AR
description:
We thought we were alone.
We were wrong.
We are under attack by alien invaders! How, Why - none of that matters now. Take control of our most advanced weapons and defend our fleets and outposts. You are the last hope of humanity.
Your phone opens a window into a beautiful, immersive universe. Forget about a virtual joystick: In this action-packed game, your whole body is the controller, and your movement seamlessly controls your viewpoint. Move around, turn around, get lost in the stunning visuals - but don't forget: Alien invaders are coming, and you will need to be fast to defeat them.
Experience massive space battles in Augmented Reality. Fight with explosive weaponry against swarms of enemies in a stunning universe.
---
Compatible with all ARKit compatible iOS devices.

description: Totally Realistic Space Combat Simulator.

name: Mad Truck 2
description: Mad Truck 2 - drive the big mad truck on the mountain road to reach the destination in the limited time. There are many barriers(woods, stones, drums, scrap-car, zombies) on the road. It is crazy with big challenge.

name: Offroad Unchained
description: Drive with speed, drift in the mud and jump with your car to cross the finish line first. Unchain the potential of your offroad cars by customizing and upgrading. Join teams, make friends and start your offroad legacy. That’s Offroad Unchained. Grab the wheel and compete in PvP races against players around the globe drifting on the rough and dusty gravel roads, snow terrains or in forests. Keep racing to propel through the leagues, unlock new offroad cars, and get to know Red Bull athletes in amazing off-road tracks.

name: Stratosfall
description: Stratosfall is an epic experience loaded with beautiful graphics and engaging gameplay. Build your base, research technology, and repel the enemy onslaught.

name: BoxMan Rising
description: Dominated by gangs, the Boxman World is infested with disorder, crime and chaos. You’ve been training hard for a very long time. It’s finally time to get rid of them. However, the gangs won’t be that easy to deal with. Must get stronger, Must learn more skills, And I must be the world’s strongest fighter.

name: Snakes and Ladders!!
description:
Monopoly like Ancient Indian classic board game in the palm of your hands !!
Play against computer AI, or against your friends
5 different board maps choices and created with the latest software.

name: Airline Director
description:
Airline Director is an airline management game.
Your goal is to build your airline into a global player in the airline business.
Can you make it as an Airline Manager?

name: Dungeon Monsters
description:
Dungeon Monsters is an adventure game in 3D that can be played on the Apple Watch but also on the iPhone. It's an original game especially designed for the Apple Watch. The adventure progression is shared between your Apple Watch and your iPhone.
The goal is easy: find your way out of a 3D maze, while fighting (unknown) monsters. Your sword will help you a lot. You can also find magic potions to improve your power and to get extra-life. Gold won on the Apple Watch is multiplied by 2.
World ranking to compare your progression to all other players is also available.
